AIsystem.来源: Robots Patrol The Streets Of Singapore To Thwart Bad Social Behaviour

Risk.来源: Robots patrolling streets raises concerns about constant surveillance

Domain.来源: Robots deployed to monitor social behavior in public spaces

Purpose.来源: To thwart bad social behaviour in public areas

AICapability.来源: Robots equipped with sensors to detect undesirable social behaviors

Stakeholder.来源: Government deploying robots for public safety purposes

AISubject.来源: Robots monitoring behavior of people in public spaces

Impact.中文名称: 对社会行为的寒蝉效应影响
Impact.英文名称: Chilling Effect on Social Behavior Impact
Impact.来源: Constant surveillance may deter normal social interactions

Consequence.来源: Public surveillance robots collecting personal behavior data
